server_configuration.name: scrapegraphApiKey
server_configuration.description: Your ScapeGraph API key from the ScapeGraph Dashboard

tools.name: markdownify
tools.description: Convert webpage content into clean, formatted markdown using a simple URL input. Ideal for transforming webpages into easy-to-read text format with ScrapeGraph MCP Server.
tools.instructions:
Convert a webpage into clean, formatted markdown.

Args:
    website_url: URL of the webpage to convert

Returns:
    Dictionary containing the markdown result

tools.name: smartscraper
tools.description: Extract structured data from webpages using AI by specifying user prompts and URLs. Simplify web scraping with precision by transforming webpage content into organized, actionable information.
tools.instructions:
Extract structured data from a webpage using AI.

Args:
    user_prompt: Instructions for what data to extract
    website_url: URL of the webpage to scrape

Returns:
    Dictionary containing the extracted data

tools.name: searchscraper
tools.description: Extract structured data and reference URLs from AI-powered web searches by inputting a search query or instructions, enabling efficient information retrieval and analysis.
tools.instructions:
Perform AI-powered web searches with structured results.

Args:
    user_prompt: Search query or instructions

Returns:
    Dictionary containing search results and reference URLs
